item.title: Marvel's Thunderbolts* Box Office Officially Passes The MCU's Biggest Bomb's Entire Gross In Just 1 Week
item.description: Thunderbolts* has passed the entire box office gross of the MCU's biggest box office bomb in just one week, showing the power of the Avengers brand.

item.title: Sinners Is Doing So Well At The Box Office It's Broken A Major Ryan Coogler Record After 10 Years
item.description: Sinners has set a unique record at the box office for Ryan Coogler, proving that it is one of the most successful movies of his career.

item.title: “Am I Getting Punked?”: A Popstar Auditioning For Sinners Was So Shocked By The Vampire Twist She Thought She Was “Hallucinating At The Table”
item.description: A popstar auditioned for a key role in Sinners, and describes being absolutely shocked when she realized the period piece was a vampire movie.
